rows.label: tev017801_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev017801_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Alan about Vandham.

rows.label: tev017801_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev017801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Alan if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev017801_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Alan about frame levels.

rows.label: tev017801_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Alan about recent developments.

rows.label: tev017801_MSG0001
rows.name:
When the White Whale was in flight, Vandham was its
chief engineer. He earned the respect of a lot of the
mechanics on board.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017801_MSG0002
rows.name:
Most of the people in my department continue to hold
a deep admiration for the man.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017801_MSG0003
rows.name:
I know it was constantly being screamed at by
Vandham that made me the skilled tech I am today.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017801_MSG0004
rows.name:
But even now, whenever the commander pays us a visit,
I feel like a schoolboy in the presence of his teacher.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017801_MSG0010
rows.name:
I have a co-worker named Brenna who works as the
control-systems planner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017801_MSG0011
rows.name:
But whenever there's the slightest issue,
she immediately decides that it's impossible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017801_MSG0012
rows.name:
And when we brainstorm ideas, she has a tendency to
shoot down anything new before we can really
explore the possibilities.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017801_MSG0013
rows.name:
It's an engineer's job to always be searching for new
solutions, so I wish she could learn to be a little more
flexible in her thinking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017801_MSG0015
rows.name:
Your Skell's frame level limits the weapons and
armor it can equip.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017801_MSG0016
rows.name:
In other words, if you want to use high-powered
weaponry, you'll need a frame that's built to handle
that level of power.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017801_MSG0017
rows.name:
When you're shopping for a frame, don't just compare
attack and durability statsâ€”make sure it's capable of
equipping the gear you were hoping to use.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017801_MSG1001
rows.name:
I was talking with Brenna the other day.
Seems like she's really learned to be more flexible
in her approach to problems.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017801_MSG1002
rows.name:
Until recently, whenever there was an issue she would
immediately go straight to the most established and
least risky solution.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017801_MSG1003
rows.name:
But when we spoke last time, all she wanted to talk
about was pursuing one new possibility after another!
I almost wondered if I was talking to Lin in disguise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017801_MSG1004
rows.name:
Maybe she learned something important from that big
job we did recently. I know I did![ST:wait ]
